title: Characters & Stories
description: Deep dive into the characters and plot of Harry Potter!

questions.question: Who betrayed Harry's parents to Voldemort?
questions.explanation: Peter Pettigrew (Wormtail) was the Potters' Secret Keeper who betrayed them to Voldemort, framing Sirius Black!

questions.question: Neville Longbottom destroys the final Horcrux.
questions.explanation: Neville kills Nagini with the Sword of Gryffindor, destroying Voldemort's final Horcrux!

questions.question: What is Hermione's middle name?
questions.explanation: Hermione Jean Granger is her full name. She later becomes Hermione Weasley after marrying Ron!

questions.question: Who is the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: Severus Snape is the Half-Blood Prince - his mother was the witch Eileen Prince, and his father was a Muggle!

questions.question: Snape was in love with Harry's mother, Lily.
questions.explanation: Snape loved Lily Potter his entire life. His Patronus was a doe, matching hers, and he protected Harry because of her!

questions.question: How many Horcruxes did Voldemort create?
questions.explanation: Voldemort created 7 Horcruxes (though one - Harry - was unintentional): the diary, ring, locket, cup, diadem, Nagini, and Harry!

questions.question: What are the three Deathly Hallows?

options.text: Elder Wand, Resurrection Stone, Invisibility Cloak
Elder Wand, Philosopher's Stone, Invisibility Cloak
Elder Wand, Time Turner, Invisibility Cloak
Sword of Gryffindor, Resurrection Stone, Invisibility Cloak

questions.explanation: The Deathly Hallows are legendary items from the tale of the three brothers - Harry becomes master of all three!

questions.question: Fred Weasley dies in the Battle of Hogwarts.
questions.explanation: Fred Weasley tragically dies during the Battle of Hogwarts, one of many losses in the final fight against Voldemort.
